attributes.action: Exclude pensioners from being sent to prison for non payment of community charge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pensioners should not be removed from court in handcuffs and sent to prison. Jack Straw has stated that fewer people be sent to prison. Violent criminals are often released early from a prison sentence and to send elderly people to prison for non payment of fees is a crime in it's self.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/debtorsprison/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
